post.body: I nominate @thedudedean for a Shorty Award in #BestSupportingActor because heck, he'd do the same for me... and more!
I nominate @thedudedean for a Shorty Award in #evilgenius because he promised me a senate seat if I did :P
I nominate @thedudedean for a Shorty Award in #evilgenius because stuffing the ballot box was HIS idea!!!
I nominate @thedudedean for a Shorty Award in #evilgenius because nothing short of world domination will do!
oh I can't play either. my only hope is to "fake it till I make it" :)
I hear he's an easy grader...
read in Nutrition Action about yr new drink FRS Healthy Energy (http://www.frs.com/). looks good, I wanna try it!
begging for a nomination is better than nominating yrself. I know where I stand and it's pretty low :P
41 followers / hr! how the heck do you do that?
I nominate @chuckobama for #humor. don't mess with Chuck!
hmm, I liked the intro (@ http://www.zhiing.com/) but not sure I want to get zhiinged...
there do seem to be a lot of cats on twitter tho (see http://twitter.com/sockington)
ok, I'm checking out http://zhiing.com. no promises tho!
the best defense is a good offense and vice-versa -- Yogi Berra
just checked your stats on http://tinyurl.com/6yy6je
hey ain't this fun and free? ps try http://blip.fm/all?signup=1
I thought his name was Mike Hunt lol!
john 3:16 of course. not my fave tho.
hmm that's interesting... first I've heard of a following limit
I'm so sorry to hear your news.said a prayer for you :)
*I'm* not Santa, but I'll agree to wishes being granted in general... I've got a few of my own.
you deserve everything on your list. and more.
hey Sarah get w/the program - you need a Santa hat :)
it's only obnoxious if you get caught :P
speaking of Borders, here's a 40% off coupon for this weekend!(http://is.gd/cBzF)
damn! that's all I'm sayin'.
I can tell we are incompatible already :)
that's OK nobody understands. not even me! well I may understand a leetle...
good morning. 1900 is impressive but I 1st thought you said "1900 a day". now *that* I had to check...
they are animals, what do you expect? then again you are a muppet...
idea floated: to bailout auto cos. how about govt voucher $10k handouts for 30+mpg american cars? (nevermind, bk mo' bettah!)
prediction: the http://shortyawards.com/ will shortly collapse due to ballot stuffing and targeted randomness
remembering "Fat Jimmy and the Rhythm Pigs". only time I ever saw someone throw up onstage. opened for "X" at the Whisky in the '80's. mmm.
noodled with the F chord on my acoustic during lunch. fun!
nothing says "success" like expensive accessories.
hello, hello is this thing on? I've gotten exactly 0 replies to my quality tweets today :P
#Tweetpoll : is Maxwell Smart alive? I contend that in the sense he exists at all, he is always alive (never being killed onscreen).
RT @mercurystate @marcymac Coffee is like kittens... the more the merrier. - agreed!
OH in office: Q-"Can I be a local administrator?" A-"Can you prove you won't mess things up?" my thought-"Can anyone?"
RT @nicolebandes Good laugh from @Emtnester on sperm research and camping survival! http://tr.im/25ta - note to self: read this
RT @ewop: I had to post that video, 40 Inspirational Speeces in 2 minutes... http://tinyurl.com/6ez243 - excellent!
d'oh I don't know the #twittersecret. DM me!
waiting for the auto shop to call back. hope the transmission is ok...
dunno much about the "law of attraction" but am pretty sure there is a force we can tap for positive results...
speaking of prayers, pls think of my friend Dave who's looking for work... I think today is his lucky day :) (if yr into that!)
heading for Furnace Creek, Death Valley this weekend. goal is to get some good pics (like these http://is.gd/cBYj). and not freeze.
40% off Borders coupon for this weekend (http://is.gd/cBzF). they are getting desperate - close to BK. tsk tsk.
office chatter: po'd at attorney for charging us - they called us w/an unnecessary question. what a scam!
cubicle warfare xmas list (http://is.gd/cBh9). it definitely feels like Friday.
#trend: just think how much more effective we all could be by throwing our shoes at people...
motley fool agrees w/me $NFLX fundamentally a good stock to own (http://is.gd/cB3N)
#interesting: RT @chiborg: I was slightly reluctant to read the list of most common misconceptions, but... http://twurl.nl/yrpj3z
RT @WSJ: Auto Makers to Get Funds http://tinyurl.com/4of5ql
#doh #idea: just search under #humor (http://tinyurl.com/6psbow) for some interesting people to follow!
does *anyone* use Mosaic? it is the grandaddy browser. you can still download it! (http://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Mosaic_(web_browser))
